title: Plan Container Yard Stacking
description: A vessel is due to discharge 500 containers. The yard planner must pre-plan the optimal stacking locations for them.

tasks.description: Receive the discharge list (BAPLIE file) for the incoming vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner successfully imports the file and identifies container types (standard, reefer, OOG) and weights.

tasks.description: Analyze the yard inventory and identify empty slots in appropriate zones (e.g., reefer racks, export block).
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner identifies sufficient space in the appropriate yard blocks for all container types.

tasks.description: Assign a specific yard location (block, bay, row, tier) to each container on the discharge list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Every container is assigned a yard position in the Terminal Operating System (TOS) to optimize future movements.
